body: mentioned this before but using expand in the cell will break stacking with a batched input to hidden projection using skipinput, i.e. lstm_skip >>= linear >>= lstm_skip, since it's implicitly making the input matrix [I;I;I;I], which is strictly weaker than the normal projection which is untied. more concretely, with this expand skip_input implementation the linear will be nhid x nhid instead of nhid x 4*nhid.
